description:
With the Google Wallet plugin, you can automatically have live flight & train times, boarding passes, and tickets shown in Smartspace for easy access, as well as selecting loyalty cards and passes to display in Targets. By combining with location or time requirements, you can display cards & passes automatically when they are required, and where possible (and if enabled) they can be accessed without even unlocking your device.

**Requires Google sign in, [source code available on GitHub for inspection](https://github.com/KieronQuinn/SmartspacerPlugins/tree/main/googlewallet)**
changelog: Fixed live train times not working
